about_the_game:
Ruin Raiders, a daring few who risk everything to explore ancient second-era tombs. With the promise of great rewards, they unearth relics of immense power, remnants of a bygone era. The Church of Eion strives to secure these artifacts, sealing them away in heavily guarded vaults. Yet, some relics slip through, disrupting the status quo. This is one such story....

  • Charming 2D Pixel Art Style.

  • Master tactics to overcome many battles.

  • Unique boss fights that are more than just HP sponges or enemies that simply hit harder.

  • Interact with a fleshed out and unique world that melds fantasy and elements of science fiction.

  • Create bonds with your fellow party members. Up to twelve interesting characters.

  • 20+ hour story rich role playing campaign.

Lead your team of Ruin Raiders into a variety of combat situations to overcome many obstacles! 

  • Engage in a deep system of magic known as Arcanics. Nine different elements of spells each with their own spell trees.

  • Not every character is created equal, some are more magically inclined while others prefer a martial combat style, and a few even mix them up.

  • Swap out characters anytime in combat.

  • Take part in battles that are small and large.

  • Coerce your enemies to retreat through a dynamic morale system.

  • Not every battle needs you to wipe out all the enemies, some require special conditions to beating.

Leverage a deep customization system to build your perfect team of heroes.

  • Make use of customizable weapons and armor.

  • A flexible spell/skill slots system that grows depending on the equipment you have on.

  • Level up and allocate points to various primary stats.

Explore a land full of secrets and puzzles!

  • Look for hidden items and chests throughout the Storm Lands.

  • Find hidden dungeons and battles for epic items and secret quests.

  • Discover and work with new hidden party members that will join your cause for the entirety of the game.

short_description: Play as the noble spellsword Manathir in an adventure of a lifetime with a discovery that might just change the world. Master tactical battles both large and small, take on unique boss encounters that push your tactical prowess. Explore a science-fantasy world while forging bonds with characters.
